text:
@PressSec Wear yer mask 😷 
Oh wait...
 ... let’s not let science get in the way of hurriedly reopening the economy, or holding large indoor rallies.
The GOP’s cavalier attitude about the coronavirus is what killed Herman, just as sure as if you’d shot him with a gun.
